main.title: Hi, I'm Carlos Galindo

main.description: I have experience in web development both frontend (Nextjs, React) and backend (Nodejs, .NET), as well as in databases (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB).

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a software developer with experience in web development both frontend (Nextjs, React) and backend (Nodejs, .NET), as well as in databases (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB). I am passionate about technology and I am always looking to learn new things.
